message.body: Alex. I officially live in boston!!! Are you around? What's your schedule like? I think Ariel is planning a beach day sat, would you and your lovely lady be interested in joining us? If not no worries, but we should totally grab a drink!

I can't sat its 9/1 my most craziest day of the year when all my tenant move out and new ones move in. Can't wait to hang tho! Will touch base after 9/1 until then my life is 24/7 finishing my construction projects
Oh man! That's right this weekend is move in hysteria. So glad I beat the rush. Let me know if there is anything I can do to help. My schedule is pretty lax for the time being.
When's school start?
Maybe we can chill Sunday?!
The fifth or sixth. Yeah, Sunday would be awesome. I could even meet you somewhere for a quick coffee if your still busy. It would just be nice to catch up! Let me know what your up for on Sunday!
I will!! R u living w Ariel!?
Nah Coolidge corner. It's amazing here! I love love love this place!
You are welcome anytime
I'm on a tiny block called called alton place.
If you want to look it up
I asked my realtor if they had heard of you!
Oooo I love coolidge my best friend vin lives there on longwood
Where's ur place
Oh the woman I asked didn't but she said they were very very small
Lol had they heard of me?
Lol shucks. Someone once asked Ariel at cvs or something if she was related to Hodara real estate
I was like: you should look him up, he'll be running this town by the time he's 30... HODARA EVERYWHERE
And all your houses will come with a signature Hodara painting!
That's awesome!
I felt kinda coollol. I gatta show u my props! U will find them interesting from architecture standpoint
Yeah I'm down
